title: Ticket #3810: condor_status -sort sorts differently with -format vs without
description:
Try it! 
  condor_status -format '%d@' slotid -format '%s' machine -sort 'strcat(Machine,slotid+10000)'
vs. 
  condor_status -sort 'strcat(Machine,slotid+10000)'
If this bug didn't exist, you could just set condor_status's default sort value to 
strcat(Machine,slotid+10000)
and it would solve #3809.
creator: pfc
